name: Vunnu 💖
greetingText: I really love your name, it's as lovely as you! 💕
wishText: May our love be as strong as a `const` and never change like a `var` 😉
textInChatBox: Happy Girlfriend Day to you, my sweetest bug! 💌 You make everything brighter!
text2: I was going to just send a text.
text4: I realized, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if I made you smile!
replayText: Or click to feel the love all over again.
